title: Maurissa on Finding Love and the Boom-Boom Room Backlash
description:
"Bachelor in Paradise's" Maurissa defends her decision to go to the Boom-Boom Room with Riley after their first date. She discusses their immediate attraction to each other, and how that extra time together helped strengthen their relationship. Maurissa also talks about what went through her mind when she saw Demar walk onto the beach. 

Then, Becca and Tia discuss what it’s like watching back "Bachelor in Paradise" as things start to get more serious between many of the couples. Plus, they share some behind-the-scenes details that didn’t make it onto the show. 

"Bachelor Happy Hour" has exclusive interviews every week. Watch "Bachelor in Paradise" on ABC and listen to "Bachelor Happy Hour" the next morning. 

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.
